rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0001
rows.name:
The Ritual of Bountiful
Harvest, passed down in
Gula since ancient times...

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0002
rows.name:
Did you know that its sacred
ground is in Kizan Valley?

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Every year, a maiden is
chosen to perform a ritual
to ensure a good crop.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0004
rows.name:
That ritual is performed
in Kizan Valley.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0005
rows.name:
However, it seems that a
suspicious person has been
entering the area recently.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0006
rows.name:
It is unforgivable that our
sacred land be defiled.

rows.label: tlk41300021_07_msg0007
rows.name:
Would you please lend us your strength
to drive away this intruder?
